text:
UNIVERSITY OF SOUTH DAKOTA
April 8, 1957
VERMILLION
Mrs. Judith B. Gans
Secretary, NAEB
1U Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Mrs. Gans:
KUSD would like to continue receiving the NAEB-TV Research
Fact Sheets. I was not aware that there was any billing for
this service, but if there is, we will be glad to pay it.
In the future, please address any correspondence on these
matters to me rather than to Mr. Busch. Incidentally, his
first name is Martin, not Monroe.
Sincerely,
Edward J. 8^fck
Director, KUSD
EJS:lg
